MS MCQs

    Set up maintenance information in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. What can you use maintenance codes for?

      To link different general ledger accounts to different types of maintenance.

      To link dimensions to maintenance expenses.

      To describe the kind of maintenance that is performed on fixed assets when you are posting the maintenance.

      To use on the Maintenance Registration page to allocate maintenance that is performed on a fixed asset to multiple accounts.


    2. What is the purpose of the Maintenance Vendor No. field on the fixed asset card Maintenance FastTab?

      To enable posting maintenance expenses to an asset.

      To indicate the vendor that usually performs maintenance for that asset.

      To include the asset in the Suggest Fixed Asset Maintenance report.

      To have access to the list of vendors that can perform maintenance when you create a purchase order.
